alert.note: Alert for Lee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 10:49AM CST until January 29 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Accumulating snow, including potential for freezing rain, with hazardous travel expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. A light glaze of ice possible this evening. * WHERE...Lee County. * WHEN...Until 3 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow covered roads and slippery travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall rates of one half inch per hour are expected to occur through this evening. Snow could taper off or briefly end at times this afternoon, but that should be temporary. A mix of freezing rain and snow is possible this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
